name: PHONESERVICE
description: Telephone service for the household
encodings: 1.0=Landline telephone only|2.0=Have a landline, but mostly use cellphone|3.0=Have cellphone, but mostly use landline|4.0=Cellphone only|5.0=No telephone service

name: HHSIZE
description: Household size (including children)

name: HH612
description: Number of HH members age 6-12

name: HH1317
description: Number of HH members age 13-17

name: HH18OV
description: Number of HH members age 18+

name: Stigma_Scale_Score
description: Stigma scale: average score of 6 stigma items; higher scores indicate higher stigma.

name: Discrimination_Scale_Score
description: Discrimination scale score from average of four discrimination variables. Higher scores indicate more acceptance of discrimination.

name: Income_relativeMedian
description: Income coded into above/below median for state.

name: ANY_COVIDtest
description: Either self or household member tested for COVID.

name: Positive_COVIDtest
description: Either self or household tested postivie.

name: PersonalCrimJust_Ever
description: Combined personal history of conviction or incarceration.

name: FamilyCrimJust_Ever
description: Combined family or friend history of conviction or incarceration.

name: COVIDsymptoms
description: Had COVID symptoms but was not tested, self or household.

name: PersonalMisuse_Lifetime
description: Personal history of every misusing opioids

name: FamFriendMisuse_Lifetime
description: Have family or friends that have ever misused opioids

name: FamFriendOverdose_Lifetime
description: Have family member or friend that has ever overdosed

name: PersonalMisuse_Recent
description: Personal misuse within the last 12 months

name: FamFriendMisuse_Recent
description: Family or friend has misused opiods in the past 12 months

name: FamFriendOverdose_Recent
description: Family or friend overdosed in past 12 months

name: PersonalOverdose_Lifetime
description: Personal history of overdose from opioids

name: PersonalOverdose_Recent
description: Personal overdose from opioids in last 12 months

name: INCOME4
description: Household income (4 categories)
